title: LF Support Main
body:
Looking for High Gold Low Plat Support
Must be calm, And willing to point out their own mistakes as well as mine ;D
Add IGN:Alekz

replies.body: Here is your first mistake, you don't play Ezreal only.

hey dude im not a gold or plat ranked player but I do main leona supp if ur looking for some1 that plays everyday.
if u need some1 add me ign  imtheanimal
